0: Rooms are very nice walls between the rooms are thin owing to this we did nt have a good nights sleep we could hear what was going on next door most of the night

My only comment was that some of the tv and radio channels did not work but I was not that bothered as we were hardly in to watch listen one of them things I guess which would have been sorted if we mentioned to reception but I was not fussed
soIf you want breakfast you pay about £ 1595 each from what I rememberIf you want WiFi in your room you have to pay
This is 2015 basic facilities should come free especially considering the over inflated room costs
We enjoyed the leisure spa and appreciated the lovely warm pool but the steam room was a little erratic and ran out of steam quite regularly

I stayed 3 nights for business trip this was my first timeThe hotel building is moderneThe room was correct The gym and swimming pool very good quality I did not eat at the hotel restaurant so I do not know the qualityThere is big reception very good for have a drink The only reason I do not give 5 to the rating is the executive lounge which was not what I experienced in other Mariots The breakfast is sort of ok but the diner was very limited not lot of choices The Mariot team were professional and helpful
Already booked againwas not overly keen on a window that did not open

This is just for business and not for a holiday unles you like being stuck in the middle of an industrial estate Stayed in room 541 and it is now midnight as I write this and the airconunits on the roof are screaming lie mad can not be moved as all rooms booked HelpStaf are ok
was not keen on the shower curtain
Check in was no hassle and the room we had was comfortable
1: The room was modern and bed really comfortable
We arrived early to check in and our room was available
Swimming pool sauna steam room ready accessible
Comfortable spacious and clean rooms with great facilities
As the sun rises the light comes into the room at a nice angle
Thanks also to Sally who checked us into room 301 it was lovely Sally thanksx
Between 530 to 7 pm it offers unlimited free bottled beer wine and light snacks which our party of 20 people took full advantage of
The staff also sorted out the extra bed I need for the youngest and rearranged the bedroom to suit
Nice rooms a good size internet connectivity was good and it had a code to join which Mae it easier
Check in was smooth and my room easily located
